alert.note: Alert for Calhoun; Liberty (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 10 at 2:30PM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southern Calhoun County in the Panhandle of Florida and southwestern Liberty Counties in Big Bend of Florida through 315 PM EDT/215 PM CDT/... At 230 PM EDT/130 PM CDT/, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 12 miles northeast of Stonemill Creek, or 12 miles south of Blountstown. This storm was nearly stationary. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Blountstown, Orange, Bristol, Clarksville, Abe Springs, Sharpstown, Vilas, Jensen Place, Central City, Red Hill, Marysville, Scotts Ferry, Kennys Mill, Estiffanulga, Kern, Wilma, Frink, Kinard, Lewis and Woods. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
